column4: and iam wondering one thing... how do i compile something i have downloaded?? i can easy manage themes  but i dont know how to compile a program so that i can run it...
i got some tar.bz2 file too
all i need to know is how to install .tar.bz(2) programs
i need to know that to be able to install ndis
once you have it extracted to a folder... cd foldername/ &  ./configure & make & make install
just use that chkrootkit in apt repo's
dude I told you rkhunter isn't in the repositories..... it won't show up if it isn't there
are you reading what I have been typing?
iam just getting errors when doing apt-get install
open a new terminal, then type: sudo -s  : then do: apt-get install nmap
